sentences: Some observers have detected a growing feeling of frustration and unease as time for negotiation in Lyon starts to run out.

Wednesday's stand-off in the mechanisms group on whether to include LULUCF in the CDM, loss of momentum on the technology transfer text, and an outcome in the P&Ms meeting that some found disappointing, all contributed to a sense of concern at the apparent lack of progress.
enb_long_title: Thirteenth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies of the UNFCCC
